reviews.review: Loved it. This game is a breath of fresh air from the usual multiplayer experience. The mechanics seem to play really well into each other making the game fairly balanced and interesting.

game started out fun! Till the victoms get to jump over shit faster with also infinite heals are just insane i get tired of running and chasing the same guy over and over becasue he continulesley jumps ove somthing and just wast your time lame..... Needs more perks for the killer to keep the fun going. or second option is to have two killers vs 4 or 8 victoms.
可玩性很高，团队合作性很强，同时，对人物技能的熟悉度很必要，背板也是不可或缺的（笑）。当然如果游戏语言能够设置成简体中文，会吸引更多的玩家。
Amazing horror survival game ever !!!

재미는 있는데 버그가 매우 많고 기준도 이상함 ㅋ근데 재밌으니까 사라 ㅋ
 아니 다른건 그렇다 쳐도 살인마가 나가면 평가 좆같이 변하는건  왜 그렇게 만든지 모르겠다
 또, 맵도 이상하다. 어떤곳은 겁나게 살인자한테 유리하고, 어떤 곳은 살인자가 다가가지도 못하고 농락되게 만들었다.
 가장 이상한건 점수 시스템. 왜 생존자 점수 평가가 이따위인가?
솔직히 행걸린거 도와주는 것과 발전기 돌리는 것 등은 위험도는 크지만 저러는 것보다
그냥 살인마 베이스에 짜져있다가 나가는게 낫다. 남을 돕거나 발전기 돌리는 일은 매우 위험해서 잡힐 가능성or덫에 걸릴 가능성이 크지만, 기지에 있으면 주의깊은 살인마가 아니면 잡지 못하기 때문. 실제로 고렙 유저들은 공구 들고서 고리 빼거나 지하에 짱 박혀있다가, 누가 잡히면 구해줄 생각 없이 혼자 남길 기다렸다가 개구멍으로 나간다. <또 잘하긴 겁나 잘해서 발전기 다 꺼져있어도 기어이 두개는 키고 기어나간다.
 좌우지간 패치가 시급. 또 궁금한게 있는더 곰덫은 대체 확률이 왜그런건가? 한번 걸리고 8번 까지 실패해봤다. 아군 도와도 보너스가 적은데 누가 돕겠는가.... 좌우지간 협동 점수의 패치가 시급하다.
ps. 손전등은 왜있는건가?  아니 효과는 아는데 실제로 쓰는 걸 본적이 없다. 그 사거리에 그 만큼 오래 비춰야하는데 살인마가 걸어와서 안치고 뭐하겠는가...ㅋ
ㅋ근데 재밌으니까 사라 ㅋ

I love this game, although it needs a "survive with friends" option, which would make the game 10 times more amusing. Nonetheless, it's a terrific game with constant andrenaline rush each game, no matter how much you've played.

This is an absolutely amazing horror survival game. You and 3 other people work together to escape the killer. This game  gets your adrenaline pumping. It has great developers that actually listen to the community and are coming out with patches, new characters, items, etc. You can have private matches with just your friends if you want to play a fun game with them. If you are a fan of the horror/survival genre, I definitely recommend trying this game out.

Dead by Daylight- эта игра про 4 жертв которые попали в логово маньяка(есть 3 или 4 разные карты и пока что только 3 маньяка) Жертвы ничем от друг друга не отличаються кроме внешнего вида ну и комплекции тела. Манньяки же соовсем разные:
1 Trapper- он может расставлять ловушки его оружие это самодельный тесак
2 Wraith- может входить в инвиз но бить может только без инвиза при этом вы не чувствуете страха когда он невидим (не бъёться сердце) но можно увидеть его силуэт.
3 HillBilly-имеет с собой бензопилу с помощью которой он может очень быстро спринтовать но при этом неповоротлив.
Вообщем игра очень хорошая может покатать с друзьями в закрытом лобби но есть 1 минус:
чтобы поиграть в онлайне с другими игроками и своим другом нужно одновременно нажать Join lobby но и то не вариант что вас закинет вместе.
Я не желею отданых за игру денег да есть багино их мало и они часто исправляються.
Если хотите поугарать вместе с друзьями или просто наложить пару кирпичей то эта игра для вас!

I decided to re-write my review on this and my opinion hasn't been changed this game still sucks despite playing it for so many hours. Balance is the major reason, not to mention the same objective kinda sucks only option is either find the generators as survivors and get to the exit. If your the last one standing you can either activate generators to exit or find a trapdoor if your lucky. Survivors are given only two ways to defend themselves by either using a flashlight (Which you have to find), or by using wooden pallets hoping it stuns the killer which doesn't do much. Escaping a killer pursuing you is next to almost impossible specially if the killer is either Shaper(Micheal Myers), Nightmare(Freddy Krueger), Hag, Doctor, or Pig(Saw). Also some players will camp your dying body as you crawl or are hooked to see if anyone tries to save you. Which sadly if your lucky to get saved. Some of the perks are barely helpful either since not many of them really do jack shit for survivors. Oh and if a survivor is hit twice they are down or due to a killer's perks or add-ons they can be instant downed. Oh forgot to mention killers can execute you with a perk under special conditions.

Playing the killer you think would be fun, but it gets dull as well or if your with asshole survivor players who stay at an open exit to taunt the killer making the game less enjoyable. Not to mention some killers are beyond broken in the game such as Shaper who litterally has almost no heartbeat to alert survivors. The Hag who can have a trap set which when a survivor sets it off she can instantly warp to that spot. The Doctor who can cause players to alert where they are at with his ability to electricute. Nightmare who puts a player to sleep and is next to almost impossible to escape like most killers (Good luck trying to wake up survivors in time.) The Pig is even more broken who can place a beartrap on a player's head and force them to either use puzzle boxes to get it off or die trying to escape. Pretty much DLC killers are beyond broken.

Overall worst horror game that is pretty much hide and fuck with player simulator that is beyond unfun. I would rate it a 4 out of 10. Even with Bill from Left4Dead this game sucks. No thought or so called play testing was put into this game don't even bother buying it at full price your better off with other multiplayer horror games such as Friday the 13th. They also keep releasing more useless dlcs that really don't make the game any better. It's like a half-ass worded mess like some mobile games that are noting more then cash grab schemes.

This game has its problems, there is no doubt about that. But it is a thrill ride, and its so close to being on the cusp of greatness that its hard to not reocmmend. There's nothing like running away from a killer and finally breaking away from his pursuit. It's great. 

Being a survivor certainly requires a lot more skill than say being a killer, but being a killer isn't all that easy either. it's close to being balanced, a few kinks to work out and it should be good. Developer is great with getting content out so far, and they do keep the comunity abreast of things that they are working on. Overall, its great fun.
want to play it but you have to be level 11 so really passive aggresive but the gameplay looks good

*edit 3* June 2017

They unlocked everything for kill your friends mode (a mode that lets you have private matches with people on your friends list).
With this, you dont have to worry about grinding for the right perks and equiptment to do well against your friends.

In my oppinion this feature solidifys this game into the category of timeless classic.
because of its peer to peer connection and this feature, it is future proof.
Ill enjoy playing this for many years with my friends.

*edit 2* December 2016

If there is one thing any game played online with random people have in common its that the games themselves are great, its people that are the real buzzkills.

I still say this game is better enjoyed with friends, only because friends generally wont attack you because they lost. friends generally treat eachother with at least some level of respect.
If you dont mind or even enjoy the bitter comments from random people then online play is perfect for you. Im pretty sure only league of legends and the great salt lake rivals the amount of salt generated from this game's players.

A lot of the infinites have been fixed and they even added a mechanic to stop it completely by giving windows a cooldown if used often, closing them temporarily by the spider god.
As of right now the devs are working on camping.
Despite the unpleasable fanbase, the devs have been working quite persistently to fix the problems introduced and discovered by players themselves.
A large enough sample size will always make the flaws stand out more.

Overall its still a fantastic game. There really are only 3 other games like it and they wont even come out until next october (2017)

This game is extremely fun with friends or just playing alone on multiplayer

While the concept is interesting and the lore (and items) have a wonderful Lovecraftian feel to them... I cannot reccomend this game in it's current state as of 6/27/2016.

I play competitive PvP quite frequently and I know when a game is unbalanced. They need to buff the survivors a little bit more and find a point of harmony. It takes no skill to play as the killer and it takes a lot of luck to be a survivor. In my personal opinion, this game is not fun. It suffers from being "boring" on one side and "too difficult" on the other.

Mechanics need to be balanced and the game needs to be amusing (enjoyable, fun), regardless of difficulty cap. Because that's what the word "game" essentially means in the dictionary. I don't feel this game manages that.

Dead By Daylight will likely be worth another look at when it's fully released and has been around long enough for the developers to do more balancing, but right now, quite a few players may find the game frustrating - particularly if they only play as survivors.

Anyways, I don't usually write reviews, but I just had to share a story in this game.

I was a survivor. Our team tried our best to win, but the killer had been outplaying us the entire game and eventually, it led to a hook fiesta where eventually everyone on the team was downed in the same area. The killer, seemingly satisfied, starts to pick up the survivors.

Suddenly.

One by one, the survivors DC. The killer, helpless, watches as the fruits of his hard work slip away, as the survivors, in a fit of salt and rage, all disconnect. Meanwhile, I'm still on the ground, watching this happen. I'm considering disconnecting when he picks me up. Instead of hooking me on the hook right infront of him, he rapidly shakes his head, cloaking and uncloaking. He takes me to a generator. He starts furiously beating the generator with his club. He lets me wiggle free, and repair the generator. When I finish, he swings and downs me. Perhaps he wanted to give me a little more points before my defeat. However, instead of hooking me, he takes me to another generator and beats that one with a club, too. We repeat the process.

Once I'm finished repairing the generator, the killer downs me once more. I'm sure he just wanted to give me a couple more points so I don't lose my rank. He carries me in the direction of a hook. Just as I thought the journey had ended, he walks right past the hook, and plops me down on the trapdoor. 

I spin circles in the ground, trying to indicate that he deserves a victory. He just looks at me solemnly and slowly nods, looking as I'm still spinning on the ground. He turns away, cloaking, and leaves me alone. I escape. 

Bless you, Gaz.

The game is great, with a few bug fixes and a few balance reworks, I can feel that the game will be much better in the future. Devs also seem to listen to the players, and party queue and window cheesing reworks seems to be coming soon. Few issues, like disconnecting problems, but overall game is fun and very enjoyable.

Really fun multiplayer with a lot of potential, but with a few game breaking bugs

Penalties for DC's added :)

Ive heard that a party system is on the way so i will leave that out

A few gamebreaking bugs that ive encountered include: not being able to pick up someone you've downed as the killer, having no prompt to try and free yourself when in a bear trap, fast vaulting over walls when you arent sprinting, clipping into sections of the ground when downed as a survivor making it very difficult for the killer to see you.

With polish this game could be really great, but as it stands i can't give it anything higher than a 8/10
if the game breaking bugs are fixed this game could easily be an 8.5/10 or even higher, if they support the game with new maps/survivors/killers/etc..

TL;DR version: Brutally kill badly-dressed millenials in a pulpy horror-movie setting.  What more could you want?
---
NOTE: The Development team is commited and engaged - but they're also noobs at running a networked multi-player game.  And it shows.  They tend to screw up launches.  Matchmaking is pretty much a disaster right now.  If you can join a game (not always easy!), it's likely you'll be mixed in with players of all levels.  Kind of like trying to go on an RPG raid with a random group of players who may or may not even qualify for the minimum requirements.  MAtches can be ridiculously lopsided as a result.

The easy (and obvious!) fix is to filter players based upon their experience with the game as reflected by total character levels or by their total bloodpoints - but the developers seem committed to doing things the hard way (by Rank - which is completely irrelevant to a players earned skills, perks, or abilities) when it comes to matchmaking.

I'm sure that things will get better... but be prepared for lots of ongoing frustrations as the dev team figures out how to cope with their game's unexpected popularity and succees.

---

This game's primary appeal is how it makes you feel like you're part of a horror flick.  It does a great job doing this via its music, visuals, sound effects, and user interface.  

The game is unique in that it is asymetrical by design.  You can play as either be the unstoppable brutal killer intent on sacrificing your vicitms or you can be one of four clever survivors attempting to escape the killer's wrath.

Longevity comes in the form of earning "blood points" based upon your performance in a match.  Those blood points can be used to buy various upgrades and perks for either your survivor or your killer.

Balancing an asymetrical multi-player game like this is quite a challenge.  There continue to be many problems and frustrations.  However, the developers are committed to improving things.

I originally gave the game a thumbs down review, but they've made things much better (when the lobby matchmaking is actually working!) and I am revising it to be a thumbs up.  Because I'm a responsible reviewer.

I use to have a lot of fun on this game. With or without friends. I stopped playing for a good eight months because I got bored of it and the community was just toxic all around. Sad to say same boring game eight months later. the community has gotten a little better, However I do not think this game is worth the time to play.

Oyunda 1 katil 4 tane kurban oluyor eğer kurbansanız 5 tane jeneratörü açıp kaçış kapısından kaçmanız gerekiyor eğer katilseniz amacınız belli o 4 kişinin kaçmasını engellemek gelelim artılara ve eksilere 


Artılar
+ Oyunda kurban kişi olarak oynarken o yaşadığınız gerilim her şeyi daha iyi kılıyor
+ Eğer sürekli o gerilimi yaşamaktan sıkıldıysanız katil siz olup başka insanlara o gerilimi siz yaşatabilirsiniz
+ Her karaktere özel farklı bloodweblerin olması kendisinizi farklı hissetmenize yarıyor 
+ Oyunda 2 jeneratör açıksa ve kurban olarak kendi başınıza kaldıysanız  trap door acılıyor rasgele bi yerde eğer o kaçış yerini bulursanız direk girip kaçabiliyosunuz 
+ Tek bir katil seçeneği degilde 3 tane katil karakterinden biri olabiliyorsunuz 
+ Fps sorunu daha hiç yaşamadım
+ Katil arkadaşınızı astığında onu kurtarmak için girdiğiniz uğraşlar zevkli oluyor 

Eksiler
- Katil iyi oynuyorsa kaçısınız bayağı zor oluyor
- trap doorun tam içine atlarken eğer yere düşerseniz görünmez oluyosunuz
- Arkadaşlarınla beraber girmek için grup kuramıyosun sadece aynı lobiye düşmeye çalışıyosunuz buda biraz zaman alıyor
- Eğer yeni katil oynamaya başladıysanız kaçanlar size bayağı sorun yaratıyor ben kriz geçirmiştim

Sonuç

8/10 hala birkaç sorunu var ama bayağa zevkli direk almanızı öneririm

Le jeux ces GRANDEMENT améliorer, joueurs tueurs et beaucoup moin frustrant; jouer survivant n'est pu DU TOUS une auto-win. Ce qui permet ducoup de pouvoir profiter de façons beaucoup plaisante l'ambiance du jeux.

Oyun çok sarıyor. Oynadıkça daha çok seviyorsun.
Grafikler gayet iyi ve oyun genel olarak stabil.
Rank sistemi var, oynadıkça "Blood Point" kazanıyorsun ve yeni şeyler açıyorsun.
Müzikler cuk oturmuş insanı germeyi başarıyor. Oynarken benim gibi yerinizde duramıyorsanız, katil sizi yakaladığında sağa sola dizinizi çarpabilirsiniz dikkat edin. :)

Oyuna gelen son güncellemeyle FPS büyük oranda artmış durumda.
Geliştiriciler oyunla gerçekten çok ilgileniyorlar. Şikayetleri görüp hemen güncelleme çıkarıyorlar.

Almayı düşünüyorsanız düşünmeniz çok yersiz çünkü steamde satın alınabilecek belli başlı oyunlar var zaten. Bu da onlardan biri. 

Arkadaşlarınızla oynamıyor olsanız bile zevkli. İlla arkadaşınızla oynayacaksınız diye bişey yok ama sağlam bi takımla alt edemeyeceğiniz katil yok bence. :)

Das Spiel ist gut und atmosphärisch, es fehlt leider nur ein Feature, was ich als sehr störend empfinde. Ich kann nicht mit einer Partie aus Freunden gemeinsam Spiele joinen. Entweder spiele ich nur mit Freunden, wobei ich das Spiel nicht öffentlich machen kann oder ich und meine Freunde müssen so lang in Spielelobbies verbinden, bis wir zufällig im selben Spiel sind. Ein Gruppenjoin oder eine Möglichkeit Freunde in das Spiel einzuladen gibt es nicht. Letzendlich spiele ich doch immer alleine mit komplett fremden anderen Spielern.

Wird dieses Feature nachgereicht ist es jedoch ein sehr gutes Survival Horror Spiel.

Game has no party support, almost no bugs have been fixed since early access, and just overall feels clunky. If they want to keep their population up, they better do something to mix up everything other than adding new characters, because until then I won't be touching this game again.
